mapper.select:
select od.id, od.drug_id, od.quantity, od.unit_price, od.all_price, od.order_id, di.name AS drugName, di.brand, di.images, oi.code, ui.name, ui.phone, ui.address AS userAddress from order_detail od left join drug_info di on (di.id = od.drug_id) left join order_info oi on (oi.id = od.order_id) left join user_info ui on (ui.id = oi.user_id) where 1 = 1
AND di.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{orderDetail.drugName},'%')
AND di.brand LIKE CONCAT('%',#{orderDetail.brand},'%')
AND oi.code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{orderDetail.orderCode},'%')
AND ui.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{orderDetail.userName},'%')

select od.id, od.drug_id, od.quantity, od.unit_price, od.all_price, od.order_id, di.name AS drugName, di.brand, di.images, di.dosage_form, oi.code, ui.name, ui.phone, ui.address AS userAddress from order_detail od left join drug_info di on (di.id = od.drug_id) left join order_info oi on (oi.id = od.order_id) left join user_info ui on (ui.id = oi.user_id) where 1 = 1 AND od.order_id = #{orderId}
